content: The text provides an overview of radio wave technology, including its frequency range, propagation, uses, and advantages. Alternative radio wave technologies, such as millimeter waves, terahertz waves, infrared waves, and visible light communication, are also discussed. The text explains the differences in their propagation characteristics, uses, advantages, and disadvantages compared to traditional radio waves. It highlights the future potential of alternative radio wave technologies for high-speed wireless communication and specific applications.
